code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import classes from'./search.module.css';import{useNavigate,useParams}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Search(){const[term,setTerm]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const{searchTerm}=useParams();useEffect(()=>{setTerm(searchTerm!==null&&searchTerm!==void 0?searchTerm:'');},[searchTerm]);const search=async()=>{term?navigate('/search/'+term):navigate('/');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:classes.container,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Search Food Mine!",onChange:e=>setTerm(e.target.value),onKeyUp:e=>e.key==='Enter'&&search(),value:term}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:search,children:"Search"})]});};
